predicate.note: Frames file for 'enable' based on sentences in financial subcorpus. No Verbnet entry, comparison with 'allow'.

roleset.name: allow, let

example.name: typical usage
example.text: Each of the Class C warrants will enable the holders to purchase one share of common stock at $5.50.
example.arg: Each of the Class C warrants
the holders to purchase one share of common stock at $5.50

roleset.note: 'Allow' has another argument for allowed agent, when that agent is passive-extracted from the arg1. Enable doesn't seem to allow that construction.
